rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CD1脂质组表现出基于大小的抗原展示机制研究揭示了 CD1 分子如何向 T 细胞呈递大量脂质的复杂性，揭示了一种独特的、基于大小的抗原展示系统。这些发现可以为免疫反应和抗原呈递的复杂性提供重要的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/CD1-lipidomes-exhibit-size-based-antigen-display-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/CD1-lipidomes-exhibit-size-based-antigen-display-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=480c2519-960e-4e87-8a50-0b76da110ba4 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 22:09:00 -0400 CD1 lipidomes exhibit size-based antigen display mechanisms
新研究显示人工智能可缩短中风治疗时间并挽救生命人工智能驱动的软件显着加快了中风患者大血管闭塞的检测速度，减少了治疗时间，并有可能改善结果。在四个综合性卒中中心的临床试验中，该自动化系统与死亡率下降 60% 相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/AI-slashes-中风-治疗-时间-and-saves-lives-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/AI-slashes-中风-治疗-时间-和-保存-lives-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7cedda7-c470-454b-b32c-de430bf25723 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 21:54:00 -0400 AI slashes stroke treatment time and saves lives in new study
胎盘疾病：不明原因流产的一个关键因素生殖科学的新研究确定胎盘疾病可能是 99% 不明原因流产的原因，这为流产和死产提供了线索。研究表明，识别特定的胎盘病理可能会导致采取更多的预防措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Placental-disease-A-key-contributor-to-unexplained-pregnancy-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Placental-disease-A-key-contributor-to-unexplained-pregnancy-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1a0f582-63e9-4e24-9920-ba2b52920697 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 21:47:00 -0400 Placental disease: A key contributor to unexplained pregnancy loss
释放 mRNA 疫苗的力量：从 COVID-19 到癌症等《信号转导和靶向治疗》的全面综述深入探讨了 mRNA 疫苗的多功能性和有效性，从它们在 COVID-19 中改变游戏规则的作用到在癌症和罕见疾病中的潜在应用。尽管存在稳定性和高免疫原性等缺点，但疫苗技术的进步已使 mRNA 平台成为预防和治疗干预的强大工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Unlocking-the-power-of-mRNA-vaccines-From-COVID-19-to-cancer-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Unlocking-the-power-of-mRNA-vaccines-From-COVID-19-to-cancer-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=411646ac-1e94-40ce-ac24-b5cb4ee325cc Thu, 21 Sep 2023 21:31:00 -0400 Unlocking the power of mRNA vaccines: From COVID-19 to cancer and beyond
脑脊液漏可能是将 TBI 与痴呆联系起来的机制之一根据阿尔茨海默病协会期刊《阿尔茨海默病与痴呆：转化研究与临床干预》最近发表的一项假设，脑脊液（CSF）渗漏可能是将创伤性脑损伤（TBI）与痴呆联系起来的机制之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Cerebrospinal-fluid-leaks-may-be-one-of-the-mechanisms-that-link-TBI-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Cerebrospinal-fluid-leaks-may-be-one-of-the-mechanisms-that-link-TBI-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f09ea2a-2a4b-4062-85b9-cf2a036513ce Thu, 21 Sep 2023 21:10:12 -0400 Cerebrospinal fluid leaks may be one of the mechanisms that link TBI with dementia
康奈尔大学的研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助，成立新中心，开发即时诊断设备由康奈尔大学领导的跨学科团队获得了一项为期五年的拨款，用于建立一个新的中心，用于工程、测试和商业化具有国际影响力的护理点诊断设备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Cornell-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-launch-new-center-for-developing-point-of-care-diagnostic-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Cornell-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-launch-new-center-for-developing-point-of-care-diagnostic-devices.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caa45551-e1e5-4e73-9eec-6c5f4195fa68 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 21:03:23 -0400 Cornell researchers receive NIH grant to launch new center for developing point-of-care diagnostic devices
拜登政府将禁止医疗债务计入美国人的信用评分中拜登政府周四宣布了一项保护美国人免受医疗债务影响的重大举措，概述了制定联邦规则的计划，禁止未付医疗费用影响患者的信用评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Biden-administration-to-ban-medical-debt-from-Americanse28099-credit-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Biden-administration-to-ban-medical-debt-from-Americanse28099-credit-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6a72bb2-9e6c-4013-9a24-9d8c4e6b2670 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 20:56:37 -0400 Biden administration to ban medical debt from Americans’ credit scores
TTUHSC 获得 147 万美元赠款，用于孕产妇健康研究根据《美国医学会杂志》最近发表的一项研究，从 1999 年（每 10 万名新生儿中有 10.3 人死亡）到 2019 年（每 10 万名新生儿有 21.9 人死亡），过去二十年德克萨斯州的孕产妇发病率和死亡率增加了一倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/24147-million-grant-awarded-to-TTUHSC-for-maternal-health-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/24147-million-grant-awarded-to-TTUHSC-for-maternal-health-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1f2548c-f06f-4a1f-8278-17974049193c Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:29:00 -0400 $1.47 million grant awarded to TTUHSC for maternal health research
威尔康奈尔医学院获得美国国立卫生研究院拨款领导国家避孕研究中心威尔康奈尔医学院获得了一项为期三年、近 600 万美元的资助，用于领导三个国家避孕研究中心之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-NIH-grant-to-lead-a-national-contraceptive-research-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-NIH-grant-to-lead-a-national-contraceptive-research-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df40d80b-3a9a-4325-8e04-4221c23accd9 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:25:35 -0400 Weill Cornell Medicine receives NIH grant to lead a national contraceptive research center
研究揭示婴儿颅缝早闭的原因威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员领导的一项临床前研究表明，颅缝早闭是婴儿头骨顶部过早融合的现象，是由一种先前未知类型的骨形成干细胞异常过量引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Study-sheds-light-on-the-cause-of-craniosynostosis-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Study-sheds-light-on-the-cause-of-craniosynostosis-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699fe34a-abb7-4cfd-8de2-180191d7382d Thu, 21 Sep 2023 15:18:19 -0400 Study sheds light on the cause of craniosynostosis in infants
